name: express-jobly
description: **Goals and requirements**   - All of your responses should be in JSON. Use Insonmia or curl to test your API.     - Be thoughtful about function and variable names, and for you to write appropriate documentation for every function and route.     - After each section, we expect you to write tests for the routes in that section.     - For each resource, place all of your SQL/database logic in a class. We do not want to see ANY SQL in your routes!
